repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary of Aṣṭaślokī. The text is related to Madhvas. Thin palm leaf as cover guard. Some marginal additions are found. Tamil numbers are used for foliation and are numbered in the left margin of the verso of the folio. Third line in the last folio number 19 seems to be wriiten in Tamil.

msItem.title: Aṣṭaślokīvyākhyā
msItem.author: Vaiṣṇavadāsa
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 akhilacidacidīyaḥ śrīnivāso dayābdeḥ svapadakamalayugmaprāpakassaṃśrutānāṃ nigamaśikharagamyo nityamavyājabandhūrvilasatu mama citte .. veṃ
1v 2 kaṭadeśomukundaḥ .. praṇamya deśikān sarvān
msItem.explicit:
19r 1 sārjño yadi kaścidasti bhuvane nāthassayuthatyataḥ . ityādika mantrānusandheyaṃ . dṛḍhosmiti svastiṣṭhapradarśayet na prabandhaśvanigamitaḥ . itthaṃnaca bālabodhāyārthama
19r 2 ṣṭaślokyā . yathāśrutaṃ vaṇinortho mahātmānaḥ kṣantumarhatha sahansam .

support.p: Thin palm leaf is used as cover guard.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin of the verso of the folio.

additions.desc: Tamil numerals are used for the folioation.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmate rāmānujāyanamaḥ . akhilacidacidīyaḥ śrīnivāso dayābdeḥ svapadakamalayugmaprāpakassaṃśrutānāṃ nigamaśikharagamyo nityamavyājabandhūrvilasatu mama citte .. veṃ
1v 2 kaṭadeśomukundaḥ .. praṇamya deśikān sarvān
19r 1 sārjño yadi kaścidasti bhuvane nāthassayuthatyataḥ . ityādika mantrānusandheyaṃ . dṛḍhosmiti svastiṣṭhapradarśayet na prabandhaśvanigamitaḥ . itthaṃnaca bālabodhāyārthama
19r 2 ṣṭa śyokyā . yathāśrutaṃ vaṇinortho mahātmānaḥ kṣantumarhatha sahansam . śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryamahāgurave namaḥ . śrīvādibhiḥ kṛtaṃhāgurave namaḥ ..
